name: UFGResearchTree
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: UpdateAssetBundleData
methods.comment: This scans the class for AssetBundles metadata on asset properties and initializes the AssetBundleData with InitializeAssetBundlesFromMetadata

methods.name: GetPreUnlockDisplayName
methods.comment: Returns the research tree name that should be displayed to the player before the tree is unlocked

methods.name: GetDisplayName
methods.comment: Returns the research tree name that should be displayed to the player after the tree is unlocked

methods.name: GetPreUnlockDescription
methods.comment: Returns the research tree description that should be displayed to the player before the three is unlocked

methods.name: GetPostUnlockDescription
methods.comment: Returns the research tree description that should be displayed to the player after the three is unlocked

methods.name: GetResearchTreeIcon
methods.comment: Get the icon for a research tree

properties.name: mPreUnlockDisplayName
properties.comment: The name to be displayed to the player before the tree is unlocked

properties.name: mDisplayName
properties.comment: The name to be displayed to the player after the tree is unlocked

properties.name: mPreUnlockDescription
properties.comment: The description to be displayed to the player before the tree is unlocked

properties.name: mPostUnlockDescription
properties.comment: The description to be displayed to the player after the tree is unlocked

properties.name: mResearchTreeIcon
properties.comment: Icon used when displaying this research tree

properties.name: mUnlockDependencies
properties.comment: The dependencies that needs to be satisfied before the player can use the tree

properties.name: mVisibilityDependencies
properties.comment: The dependencies that needs to be satisfied before the player can see the tree

properties.name: mNodes
properties.comment: The nodes that this tree is made up of

properties.name: mAssetBundleData
properties.comment: Asset Bundle data computed at save time. In cooked builds this is accessible from AssetRegistry

properties.name: mIncludeInBuilds
properties.comment: Slightly misleading name, as this doesn't only apply to builds. If set to Never, it won't show up in editor
